function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential effect on maternal nutrition, micronutrient deficiencies, intrauterine growth, and downstream impacts on maternal and child health programs.","Impact":"Underestimation of projected nutrition effects, reversal of progress in reducing childhood stunting.","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted maternal and child health programs, addressing micronutrient deficiencies, and ensuring access to nutrition support.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health applications for remote monitoring and support.","People":"Maternal and child health programs, children under 5 years, pregnant women.","Owner":"Health organizations, government health agencies, NGOs."},{"Description":"Collapse or reduced efficiency of sectors critical to reducing childhood undernutrition due to the widespread impact of COVID-19.","Impact":"Increased food insecurity, poor-quality diets, and disruption of food supply chains.","Mitigation":"Innovative context-specific demand and supply-side initiatives to build resilient food systems, support for informal food sectors, and measures to mitigate the impact on rural markets.","Technologies":"Data analytics for forecasting demand, blockchain for supply chain transparency, mobile payment systems for informal food sectors.","People":"Children under 5 years, families at risk of food insecurity, informal food vendors.","Owner":"Agricultural organizations, food security agencies, government departments."}]}
